title: 🌒 Maya's Intro Encounter
dialogue: Still alive in there? Thought you might be dead.
You don’t remember me, huh? Figures.
I’m Maya. You were smart once. Now you’re broke and parked on turf you don’t own.
I tossed you something green. Sell it, smoke it, or give it back. Your move.

sell.label: 💵 Sell the green
sell.response: You sold it to a corner kid for quick cash. Maya just smirks and walks off.

give.label: 🤝 Give it back to Maya
give.response: She pockets it and nods. 'You're smarter than most.'

smoke.label: 🚬 Smoke it yourself
smoke.response: You light it up. Maya sighs and disappears into the alley.
